summary: In this context, 2-methoxy-2-methylpropane is mentioned alongside various aromatic hydrocarbons, including benzene and toluene, in the analysis of groundwater and effluents. However, there is no direct discussion of the relationship between 2-methoxy-2-methylpropane and aromatic hydrocarbons, as they are simply listed as compounds analyzed in the study without any indication of interaction or significance in the context provided.
